**Required Travel:** 0-25%
**Workplace:** Hybrid

title: Google Enterprise Platform Owner
description:
At Strawberry, we're not just a hotel company - we're building a universe of experiences. We're transforming the hospitality landscape through innovation and technology.


Are you a strategic leader passionate about creating a seamless and secure technology experience?


We are seeking a **Google Enterprise Platform Owner** to strategically lead and govern the organization's utilization of the Google Workspace ecosystem. In this role, you will ensure the platform is optimized, secure, and aligned with future business needs. You will have full ownership over Strawberry’s Google workspace, acting as the central expert and internal consultant for all Google applications, add-ons, and extensions.

**What You'll Do:**

**Own the Strategy:** Develop and execute the long-term strategy for the Google platform to ensure technology meets evolving future needs and supports organizational growth.

**Drive Optimization:** Drive the optimization of key platforms like Gemini, AppSheet, and appscript, ensuring operational efficiency and maximizing user productivity.

**Govern & Support:** Oversee vendor management, provide 3rd line support escalation expertise, and serve as the internal advisor on best practices for Google products.

**Focus on Value:** Ensure maximum value from the Google Workspace investment through efficient license management and cost optimization strategies.

**L****ead Collaboration:** Lead the Google Enterprise Forum to foster collaboration, gather user feedback, and drive the strategic adoption and governance of the Google platform across the enterprise.

**Ensure Security:** Work closely with the IT security team to maintain and continuously improve security initiatives, ensuring that the use of Google Workspace is optimized and secure.

**Manage Processes:** Establish and maintain robust procedures for the seamless on-boarding and off-boarding of hotel data and access within the Google environment.

**Identify Opportunities:** Identify new opportunities and offer improvements on current services or future needs, such as the coordination of AppSheet projects.

 **Who You Are:**

We're looking for a leader who can bridge the gap between technology and the business.

**Strategic** **Leader**: You have the ability to strategically lead and govern the organization's utilization of the Google Workspace ecosystem .

**Collaborative** **Communicator**: You are skilled at maintaining excellent communication with all colleagues, effectively conveying information both up to management and down throughout the organization.

 **What You Bring:**


Education: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Business Administration, or equivalent professional experience.


Technical Expertise: Deep technical knowledge of the Google Workspace ecosystem (including Gemini and AppSheet)


Commercial Acumen: Experience in vendor management and license optimization .


Advisory Skills: You are comfortable acting as a central expert and internal advisor .


Security Mindset: You are proactive about security, working closely with IT security teams

 **What We Offer:**


Real Impact: Be a part of a dynamic transformation and contribute directly to our success story.


Empowerment: Work in a flat organization with trust, autonomy, and the opportunity to make a real difference.


Growth & Development: Access professional development opportunities to enhance your skills and advance your career.


Fun & Community: Enjoy a vibrant work environment with plenty of social events and team-building activities.


Fantastic Perks: Benefit from great employee discounts, including staff and friends & family rates at our hotels.


Flexible Work: Enjoy the best of both worlds with our hybrid model, with three days of in-person collaboration at our Oslo or Stockholm HQ.

  

We do not offer remote positions; candidates must be located in or willing to relocate to Oslo or Stockholm.
company_description: We are Strawberry. With over 225 hotels, 120 restaurants, 20 spas and more, we create thousands of experiences every day. Join a world of experiences!

title: Technical (Customization) Consultant
description:
**Kontor i Göteborg eller på distans | 40 timmar**



Det är du som översätter kundens behov till tekniska lösningar av högsta kvalitet!


**Teknisk konsult på 4PS**



4PS erbjuder olika programvarulösningar. Förutom vår egen ERP-applikation 4PS Construct, som bygger på Microsoft-teknik, skapar vi olika webbportaler och applikationer som sammanlänkas för att erbjuda våra kunder en integrerad helhetslösning. Som teknisk konsult spelar du en avgörande roll när det gäller utveckling, specificering, konceptualisering och testning av programvaruintegrationer. Dessa integrationer är avgörande för optimering av affärsprocesser. Med din expertis inom olika integrationsformer, såsom fil import/-export, webbtjänstgränssnitt och kommunikationsmönster, levererar du skräddarsydda lösningar. Detta görs i projektteam som består av kollegor och kundintressenter. Vi etablerade 4PS i Sverige i mars 2024 och kan därför erbjuda dig en unik kombination av ett snabbt, sammansvetsat och engagerat litet team med stöd av den erfarna och framgångsrika 4PS-koncernen.


**Vad är typiska uppgifter och ansvarsområden för den här rollen?**


* Du översätter kundkrav till specifika programvarulösningar.
* Du omvandlar funktionell design till teknisk design.
* Du kommer att specificera, utveckla och testa gränssnitt.
* Du kommer att bygga integrationen till andra lösningar.
* Du kan räkna med gott om utrymme och frihet att släppa loss din kreativitet.
* Du följer noga Microsofts innovationer (senaste och nyaste Business Central-versionen).
* Du brainstormar med dina kollegor för att säkerställa att projekten håller hög kvalitet.


**Vad förväntar vi oss av dig?**


* Kandidatexamen eller masterexamen inom ett relevant område, exempelvis IT och management, datavetenskap eller programvaruutveckling.
* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av en liknande roll (utvecklare eller teknisk konsult).
* Kunskap om kommunikationsmönster (batch/realtid, transaktionsintegritet), webbtjänster (SOAP/REST), dataformat (CSV, XML, JSON) och DevOps.
* Du är kommunikativ och har ett lösningsorienterat tankesätt.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.


**Följande är** **bra att ha****:**


* Erfarenhet av Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central, Programmering i C/AL och/eller AL , Azure DevOps & Git
* Erfarenhet av .Net ProxyClasses (dll), SQL Server, verktyg för webbtjänster (SoapUI, Fiddler), T-SQL, Visual Studio Code och tekniska infrastrukturer/arkitekturer.
* Förmåga att upprätthålla relevanta certifieringar (MB-800 och PL-900).
* Erfarenhet av Microsoft Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI) är ett plus.


**Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?**


* Konkurrenskraftig lön som matchar din utbildning och erfarenhet.
* Flexibilitet när det gäller arbetstider och arbetsplats.
* Telefon och laptop från företaget.
* 30 semesterdagar (och klämdagar)
* En plats där du får göra skillnad, vara innovativ och hjälpa till att forma framtiden.
* En växande organisation, både nationellt och internationellt, som kombinerar det bästa från startup- och företagsvärlden.
* Listan kan göras lång! Hör gärna av dig så berättar vi mer.

title: Lead Consultant
description:
**Kontor i Göteborg eller på distans | 40 timmar**



Du ansvarar för att erbjuda våra kunder utmärkt rådgivning som leder till lyckade implementeringar av vårt ERP-system: 4PS-Construct.


**Affärskonsult på 4PS**



4PS erbjuder olika programvarulösningar. Förutom vår egen ERP-applikation 4PS Construct, som bygger på Microsoft-teknik, skapar vi olika webbportaler och applikationer som sammanlänkas för att erbjuda våra kunder en integrerad helhetslösning. Som affärskonsult spelar du en avgörande roll när det gäller att översätta kundens affärsprocesser till högkvalitativa och praktiska ERP-lösningar. Detta görs i projektteam som består av kollegor och kundintressenter. 4PS Sverige etablerades i mars 2024, och vi kan därför erbjuda dig en unik kombination av ett snabbt, sammansvetsat och engagerat litet team med stöd av den erfarna och framgångsrika 4PS-koncernen.


**Vad är typiska uppgifter och ansvarsområden för den här rollen?**


* Genomföra strukturerad analys av kundens behov och krav för att säkerställa korrekt lösningsdesign.
* Leda kund-workshops med fokus på produktkonfiguration och utbildning i affärsprocesser.
* Tillhandahålla expertstöd och utbildning vid datamigrering.
* Bygga och underhålla starka kundrelationer, agera primär kontaktpunkt.
* Utforma funktionell design för systemändringar, ge utvecklingssupport, utföra systemtester och stödja kundutrullning.
* Säkerställa framgångsrikt genomförande av projekt samt ge stöd vid produktionssättning.
* Stödja och vägleda juniora konsulter genom kunskapsöverföring och mentorskap vid behov.
* Komplettera projektledarens arbete genom att bidra med en helhetsbild av projektets krav och framgångsfaktorer.
* Etablera starka kundrelationer som en betrodd rådgivare, samtidigt som man aktivt förespråkar en optimal lösning baserad på standardimplementering.


**Vad förväntar vi oss av dig?**


* Kandidatexamen eller masterexamen inom ett relevant område, exempelvis IT, informatik eller företagsekonomi.
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av ERP-implementeringar som konsult.
* Kunskaper om byggbranschen ELLER och Microsoft Business Central.
* Du är en kritisk och professionell sparringpartner på alla nivåer.
* Du är kommunikativ och har ett lösningsorienterat tankesätt.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.

  


**Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?**


* Konkurrenskraftig lön som matchar din utbildning och erfarenhet.
* Flexibilitet när det gäller arbetstider och arbetsplats.
* Telefon och laptop från företaget.
* 30 semesterdagar (och klämdagar).
* En plats där du får göra skillnad, vara innovativ och hjälpa till att forma framtiden.
* En växande organisation, både nationellt och internationellt, som kombinerar det bästa från startup- och företagsvärlden.
* Listan kan göras lång! Hör gärna av dig så berättar vi mer.

title: Service Delivery Manager - Information Security
description:
Are you ready to bring your innovative perspective and creative skills to ASSA ABLOY AB? Join our team in Malmö and enjoy a collaborative culture that empowers you to build a career you can be proud of.
  
What you would do as our Service Delivery Manager – Information Security
  
The Service Delivery Manager ensures that IT services are delivered effectively, reliably, and in line with business needs and contractual commitments. As the key link between technical teams, vendors, and stakeholders, the SDM oversees service performance, manages SLAs, and ensures adherence to ITIL best practices.
  
The role focuses on maintaining high customer satisfaction, building strong client relationships, and ensuring smooth daily operations across Group Information Security services such as Risk, Compliance, and Awareness. The SDM monitors KPIs, manages incidents and changes, drives continuous improvement, and ensures compliance with governance and internal standards.
  
Strong cross-functional collaboration is essential, as the SDM coordinates with internal teams, partners, and stakeholders to secure timely delivery and resolve dependencies. While not a formal people leader, the role requires the ability to influence teams, facilitate alignment, and support knowledge sharing. Overall, the SDM plays a critical role in ensuring stable service delivery, operational transparency, and the ongoing improvement of processes and service quality.
  
The role reports to the Group Information Security Manager.
  
  

**You would also:**  

* End-to-end Service Management: Oversee daily delivery of Group Information Security services (Risk, Compliance, Awareness), manage incidents, problems, and changes, ensure SLA compliance, and monitor service performance and KPIs.
* Governance & Continuous Improvement: Lead service reviews, support audits and compliance checks, identify improvement opportunities, and drive process optimisation aligned with ITIL and organizational standards.
* Stakeholder & Customer Management: Act as primary point of contact for clients, vendors, and internal teams, translate technical details into business insights, and maintain strong, trust-based relationships.
* Cross-Functional Coordination: Collaborate with security, IT, legal, compliance, business units, and vendors to resolve dependencies, manage escalations and risks, ensure service continuity, and secure seamless delivery.
* Operational Enablement: Support resource planning, onboarding, and knowledge management, maintain documentation access, and ensure alignment across teams involved in delivering services and projects.


The skills and experience you need
  
  

**We are looking for someone who:**  

* Holds a Bachelor’s degree in Cybersecurity, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience in IT service management).
* Possesses significant experience in IT service management or service delivery within a complex, global IT environment, including responsibility for SLAs and service performance.
* Demonstrates solid practical knowledge of ITIL processes (Incident, Problem, Change, and Request Management) and experience working within established governance frameworks.
* Has experience coordinating cross-functional delivery teams and managing vendor relationships in a multi-stakeholder setting.
* Has experience monitoring KPIs, interpreting service data, and driving service improvements, with beneficial exposure to information security, compliance, governance, or audit processes.


The role requires a strong communicator who can translate technical information into clear, business-oriented insights for both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Excellent stakeholder management skills are essential, as the person must be confident enough to handle pushback while maintaining collaborative and trustful relationships. We are also open to a junior candidate with some IT background, provided they have the right personality – someone communicative, service-minded, structured, and eager to learn. The ideal candidate enjoys acting as the link between the client and IT, coordinating information, aligning expectations, and ensuring smooth collaboration across teams. Since the role operates without formal personnel responsibility, the ability to influence, align, and drive progress across diverse stakeholders is crucial. A proactive and analytical mindset, strong problem-solving abilities, and sound decision-making are important, along with adaptability and resilience in a fast-moving environment. Experience from a global matrix organization is highly meritorious.
  
What we offer
  
We’re passionate about providing amazing opportunities and benefits, so you can continue and progress a lifelong career with us – here’s what we have to offer:
  
* Learning and career development opportunities, whether it’s online learning, management training or enhancing your skills.
* A competitive salary and incentive schemes.
* Modern infrastructure.


We review applications regularly, so don’t wait
  
We are building diverse, inclusive teams, and encourage applications from everyone who can see themselves working with us. Just set up your profile and apply here.
  
To make sure your personal data is safe, we don’t look at any applications sent by email or post. If you have any questions about the role or the process, email Mona Yusefi, Talent Acquisition Business Partner, at mona.yusefi@assaabloy.com
  
Depending on the risk profile for the role, a background screening will need to be performed. Final candidates may therefore be subjected to a background screening. The performance of the background check is subject to consent and based on our Applicant Privacy Notice.
  
Let’s create a safer and more open world - together!
  
To find out more about us, visit www.assaabloy.com
  
We are the ASSA ABLOY Group
  
Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 63,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.
  
As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities.
company_description: Let’s create a safer and more open world – together!

title: PROGRAMMERARE / DRIFTSÄTTARE
description:
Programmerare / Driftsättare
  
  

**Företag:**  

Norden Styr AB – Solna
  
  

**Om företaget:**  

Norden Styr AB arbetar med styrsystem, installationer, energieffektivisering och tekniska lösningar för fastigheter och anläggningar. Vi expanderar och söker en Programmerare / Driftsättare som kan stärka vårt team.
  
  

**Arbetsuppgifter:**  

Som Programmerare / Driftsättare kommer du att arbeta med både mjukvarukonfigurering och praktiskt tekniskt arbete.
  
  

**Dina uppgifter inkluderar:**  

Utveckla och anpassa programkod och styrlogik.
  
Testa, validera och dokumentera mjukvarufunktioner.
  
Installera styrsystem och utrustning hos kund.
  
Driftsätta, felsöka och kalibrera teknisk utrustning.
  
Utföra tester, funktionskontroller och driftsrapporter.
  
Ha kundkontakt vid installationer.
  
  

**Kvalifikationer:**  

Erfarenhet eller utbildning inom programmering, teknik, automationssystem eller IT.
  
Förståelse för tekniska installationer.
  
Problemlösningsförmåga och analytiskt tänkande.
  
God kommunikationsförmåga.
  
Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
  
  

**Anställningsvillkor:**  

Heltid, 40 h/vecka
  
**Lön:** 33 000 kr/mån
  
Tillsvidareanställning
  
**Placeringsort:** Solna (arbete hos kund förekommer).
  
  

**Ansökan:**  

Urval sker löpande.
  
Öppen för alla
  
Vi fokuserar på din kompetens, inte dina övriga förutsättningar. Vi är öppna för att anpassa rollen eller arbetsplatsen efter dina behov.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**Description**


**The Opportunity**


Join Hitachi Energy, HVDC, and be part of an exciting digital transformation! If you are passionate about developing software for our Analytics platforms to support internal and external stakeholders. This innovative team adds an


abstraction layer to analyze different kinds of data.


We are now looking for a talented Software Developer to join our dynamic team in Sweden. If you are passionate about developing software using the latest technologies and have excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with both internal and external teams, we want to hear from you!

**How You Will Make an Impact**

* Create high-quality and maintainable code that drives innovation
* Master the inner workings of our application and its impact on analyzing data
* Collaborate with the stakeholder to find solutions
* Innovate by developing short-lived POCs to explore new concepts for analyzing data

**Your Background**

* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field
* Experience in software development, particularly data analyzation
* Experience in Python
* Experience in Agile team environments
* Strong skills in writing, documentation, and collaboration, with the ability to express ideas clearly and effectively
* Advantage if you have been to an HVDC site and collaborated with the customer

**What we offer**

* Collective agreement
* Flexible working time
* Health care and wellness allowance
* Fantastic career possibilities within Hitachi Energy both within Sweden and globally
* Mentor to support you throughout onboard phase
* Various trainings and education supporting employee development
* Diversified company with over 70+ nationalities working in Sweden
* Supplementary compensation for parental leave
* Employee Benefit Portal with thousands of discounts and perks

**Additional information**


Are you ready for a new exciting challenge? Does the above description sound like you?


Welcome to apply for this position!

  

Recruiting Manager Johan Forsberg, johan.x.forsberg@hitachienergy.com will be happy to answer your questions regarding this position. Union representatives - Sveriges Ingenjörer: Nawzad Rashid, +46 107-38 91 48; Ledarna: Frank Hollstedt, +46 107-38 70 43; Unionen: Ingrid Rinaldo, +46 107-38 58 19.


All other questions should be directed to Talent Partner Malin Johansson, Malin.Johansson@hitachienergy.com

You may request reasonable accommodations by completing a** **general inquiry form** **on our website. Please include your contact information and specific details about your required accommodation to support you during the job application process.**
